transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ji good evening sir. Sir sorry baat karne ke liye India Mart se aapne call kiya tha humse.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir suniye kal call kiya tha to kal hamara off tha. To bataiye sir kya issue aa raha hai kya cheez dikkat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Main to wohi bol raha tha thoda by lead kar dete thoda theek to sahi ho jata kaam apna.
Executive: Achcha by lead. Do teen mahine ho gaye wohi hai matlab. Hmm aur jo inquiry aap bol rahe the.
Customer: Ji mam?
Executive: Jo inquiry aa rahi hai samne se uska kya response aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Samne se kahan aa rahi hai wohi to bol raha hu main samne se nahi aa rahi inquiry.
Executive: Achcha ek minute rukiye main open kar rahi hu. Wohi to bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji ji. Ek minute main open kar lu aapka India Mart. Samne se to bahut kam.
Executive: Sir father use. Kaun se use kare?
Customer: Main use kar raha hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha.

Customer: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Ek minute mam hold karna.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji mam.
Executive: Sir dekho actually hum leads dekh rahe the to leads ka yahan par dikha raha hai ki agar humne 50000 ke upar lagaya hai to ek designer wooden sofa set ki lead aayi hai UP se do set ki. Theek hai? Achcha abhi aayi kya? Ek wooden haan ek wooden rubber set ki hai more than 1 crore se hai Gorakhpur se hai.
Ek hai wooden platform bed hai 50 piece ka hai Rajasthan se hai.
Customer: Aur wooden platform bed.
Executive: Haan do 50000 ka filter laga ke dekhiye ek wooden beads hai bed hai Maharashtra ki 10 piece ki hai.
Customer: 50000 ka to 25000 ka lag raha hai isme.
Executive: Nahi dekho bulk order. Hmm. Dekho bulk orders ka filter aata hai to usme aap location India lagaiye. Location pe click karke India lagaiye.
Customer: India laga diya.
Executive: Haan ab isme order value select kariye dekhiye bulk aa raha hoga ya 50000 ka aa raha hoga.
Customer: Ye to ye aa raha bulk mein to 25 aa raha.
Executive: Aur ek bulk likha bhi to hoga yahan.
Executive: Dekhiye aage aage aaiyega to bulk likha bhi to rehta hai.
Customer: Bulk ke aage 25k plus aa raha.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Main bol raha tha jaise hi by lead aa rahi hai hamare se related nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm theek hai sir. Jaise ki ye ye fiber wood cover sofa hai jaise ki iska photo hai ye niche photo aa raha. Is tarah ki to hamare se related hai dekho lekin sari nahi hai ye bahut kami ke hisab se mile ek ek aadhi aur unse kuch nahi hota fir.
Executive: Achcha. To sir dekhiye do teen cheeze sahi karni padegi jaise maan lijiye Saharanpur mein competition zyada hai to hume follow up pe zyada dhyan rakhna hai aap follow up kaise karte hain by leads ka?
Customer: By lead follow up kaise karte hain?
Customer: Bas unse call karte hain call pe unhe samjhate hain aur apna fir jaise ki rate weight batate hain fir ya to koi bol deta hai baad mein batayenge ya koi call fir dobara se call nahi uthata bas aisa hi mamla ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi to aap ek kaam ye kar sakte hain sir se by jo bhi by leads aap bulk order ka filter laga ke consume kariega buyer detail check karke sab buyer details aapki side mein aur photo se confuse nahi hona hai ki photo usme kya buyer also view to dikhata hai ki buyer ne aur kya kya dekha hai. Usse confuse nahi hona usse wohi cheez chahiye. Aur dusri cheez sir jo bhi leads aap consume kariye jo bhi client agar aapko lag raha hai interested hai wo aap kahin note down karte jaiye jisme aap usko aapko follow karna hai aggressively jab tak wo deny na kar de ki sir hume nahi chahiye ya humne le liya hai ye follow karna sir hamare kaam hai jab hum call.
Customer: Isi tarah isi tarah hi karte hain isi tarah hi karte hain mam isi tarah hi karte hain tab tak wo bilkul wo mana na kar dena ki kahin aur se le liya ya kuch aur masla hai ya abhi ek mahine baad lenge do mahine is tarah kuch bhi tab tak hum unhe kuch nahi karte fir nahi to karte rehte hain message call wagera.
Executive: Haan unko follow karte rahiye ye wooden furniture sare hain aapke pass na? Ji ji sab hain.
Customer: Haan dressing table aur bhi add kiye the maine ek do catalog mein. Haan kuch keywords to abhi hum add bhi kar rahe hain aap mein. Ji ji. Theek hai? Aur ek abhi humne kuch keywords aapki profile mein ek bar check karke add karenge theek hai? Keywords mapping. Dekho mam jo jo designer design wala hai na jo bhi carving wala hai us type ka banate hain simple plain wagera ye nahi banate kyunki inme wohi hai inme to 10 15000 hai kuch bhi nahi hota inme to isse zyada ka to kiraya lag ja aadmi ka agar bolne aadmi.
Hmm. Wohi hai na. Sahi hai. Ek bar thoda keyword add kar do thoda by lead kar do sahi. Bas aadhe second bhi keywords hum add isme kar rahe hain. Ji ji. Theek hai? Baki ek bar aap ek kaam ye kariega ki by lead jo bhi hai sir search karke consume kariye wahan se filter out karke aur follow up pe dhyan dijiye jitne bhi hai unko catalog link share karke aap wahan se follow up kar sakte hain. Bilkul bilkul. Whatsapp pe. Wahi se hi karte hain whatsapp pe karte hain bilkul call bhi karte hain. Agar aap offline client hai to unse aap matlab ya online jinse aapki properly baat ho rahi hai sir unse rating and reviews aap collect kar sakte ho ki jinse aapki baat chal rahi hai. Achcha achcha. Ji hai. Haan unse karte rehte hain teen char ne kiya review bhi. Haan teen char ne aapki profile pe review bhi kiya hai. Aur total aapke 28 products added hai ek bar main check karti hu kuch products main aur isme dekh leti hu kuch keywords karke agar aapka nahi hota to main bataiye aap main meeting karne ko aaj to aap busy ho gaye warna main meeting kar kal hi karna mam kal Friday hai kal chutti hai apna kal karna. Haan kal meeting karenge baki abhi jo hai wo abhi main yahan se aapki profile mein se add kar rahi hu. Okay aur aap bulk ki leads dekh kar ke bulk ki leads ko consume kariye aaj se buyer details check karke sari. Okay mam. Aur mera number main aapko apna personal number main diya hai ek bar main fir de de rahi hu sir kuch bhi issue ho to aap us number pe call kariye to I will address you. Ji ji. Theek hai to abhi aapka kya issue dissolve ho gaya to main aapka jo ticket close kar du jo aapne India Mart mein call kiya hai baat karne ke liye? Ji ji. Theek hai aur sir aapke pass ek mail par feedback jayega to wo mera call ka feedback rahega theek hai to are you now satisfied? Okay. Aap satisfied ho? Haan theek hai mam. Haan koi nahi main kar dunga feedback. Theek hai theek hai maine sir number aapko dobara share kar diya theek hai? Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants more relevant buyleads.

- Customer says inquiries are not coming.

- Customer says bulk leads are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter buyleads.

- Executive shared tips for effective follow-up.

- Executive will add keywords to customer's profile.

- Executive offered to schedule a meeting.

- Executive shared her personal number for support.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, catalog, keywords
